['''Looks up from her screen toward Lars'''] Captain Lars, a huge battleship is approaching fast. It'll be here in just five quads. What are your orders?

['''Still staring at Steven's phone'''] I don't believe this. ['''Inhales'''] ['''Angrily'''] How is she having such a good time without me?! Does she even know I died out here?! ['''Zooms in on Sadie on a picture''']
Of course she does! She's been worried sick!
['''Observing her screen'''] Already three quads away.
['''Walks up beside Rhodonite'''] What should we do?
We ''could'' drop out of warp and ambush them, but that might be too risky. Or maybe we find a nearby planet to hide on? I'm not sure!
What do you usually do?
Usually? Usually we just follow Captain Lars' orders!
Captain Lars has taken so many risks on our behalf. We need him!
Oh, no! The warning alarm! We're in danger!
['''To Lars who is still staring at Steven's phone'''] Do you hear that? Your crew needs you.

You don't get it, do you, Steven? ['''Tearing'''] ['''Sniffles'''] It should be me. ['''Crying'''] I'm the one that should be hanging out with the Cool Kids! She's getting back at me for everything I've done!
['''Walks up beside Steven'''] Do you really think Sadie is living her life just to get back at you?
Why else would she be having so much fun without me?!

Because life goes on, no matter what happens. She was so upset when she found out you'd be stuck in space, Lars. She really misses you, but she can't stay sad forever. She started hanging out with the Cool Kids. She quit the Big Donut ['''Lars looks up in surprise'''] all because she needed to do ''something'' to feel better.
And look at you! Steven said you'd be hiding in some cave on Homeworld, but you're not. You're out here fighting for freedom with all your new friends in tow! Are you doing any of this to hurt Sadie?
No! I'm doing this because I have to. ['''Tearing'''] I'd never do this to hurt Sadie because --
Because!
Because!
''Steven and Connie grasp hands.''
Because you're best friends!
''Steven and Connie fuse.''
And best friends wouldn't do anything to hurt each other.
''The shot of Stevonnie freezes, and text appears onscreen: "STEVONNIE: AN EXPERIENCE".''
Whoa.
It's here. An imperial warship has just caught up to us.
What?
An imperial warship?
''The Sun Incinerator drops out of warp with another larger ship. The green warship turns toward the Incinerator and charges its guns.''
The Destiny Destroyer! Their main weapons are pointed right at us!

['''Smiles at a picture of Sadie'''] Hmm, pulling out the big guns just for us, huh? ['''Stands up and walks forward'''] With a ship like that, Emerald could wipe us out in an instant, ['''Hands the phone to Stevonnie'''] if she really wanted to.
Of course she wants to!
Incoming message from the Destiny Destroyer.
Onscreen.
''Emerald appears onscreen.''

['''Laughs'''] Did you really think I wasn't going to be able to track my own ship? The Sun Incinerator's specialized nova thrusters give off an energy signature I could recognize from the other side of the galaxy. Now surrender to me or be destroyed!
['''Laughs'''] I'd never surrender to you! ['''Turns away from the screen'''] Blow us into stardust like you've always dreamed of.
['''Pauses briefly in surprise'''] Very well. Prepare yourselves for destruction!
''Message ends.''
Lars, what are you doing?!
Drop the shields, Rhodonite.
But that would leave us open to their attack! We wouldn't stand a chance!
Trust me, we'll be just fine. Now lower the shields.
But...
The destroyer's weapons are charged at 90%. They're preparing to open fire!
Lower the shields! That's an order!
['''Gulps'''] L-Lowering shields.
''The shields are lowered just as the Destiny Destroyer fires. The lasers graze the Sun Incinerator, causing the ship to shake and the crew to scream in panic.''
Twins, what's our status?
Our weapons and shields have been knocked offline, but... Otherwise, we're fine.
We're still... alive! The lasers barely grazed us!
Emerald is about to attack, but she's going to miss on purpose.
['''Chuckles'''] Bingo, bongo!
''Emerald appears on the ship's screen.''
What do you think you're doing?!
['''Laughs'''] You really ''do'' have a heart, don't you, Emerald?
W-What?!

['''Turns around and points triumphantly at Emerald'''] You're not going to hurt this ship! You love this ship! It's your best friend. You'd much rather let it get away than destroy it. ['''Poses and giggles''']
Wow, Lars, I missed you.
You're right about that. I won't destroy my beautiful ship. But I will make it so you can't get away! ['''To crew offscreen'''] Aim for their nova thrusters!
''The Destiny Destroyer fires on the Sun Incinerator. The smaller ship shudders and the crew shouts.''
Evasive maneuvers! If only our weapons and shields were online.
['''Operating the console'''] I think she has us this time.
Unless we use ''that''.
That?!
''A video message from Fluorite pops up on Rhodonite's screen.''
No-o-o-t tha-a-a-a-t.
What's that?
The captain's experimental fighter jet that only he knows how to drive. It's too risky!
We're out of options. ['''Returns to his chair''']
But, Lars, your crew needs you here on the ship.
You got a better idea?
['''Salutes'''] Captain Lars, permission to go in your place. If it's anything like driving a car, I should be fine.
Permission... granted! Take out the enemy's main cannons while we get our weapons system and shield back online.

''Lars presses a button on his chair. A green blob rises from the floor, engulfs Stevonnie, and pulls them into a chute. As Stevonnie falls through the chute, screens of the crew appear around them.''
Fluorite, how long before we have full power to shields and weapons?
Give me fi-i-ve minu-u-tes.
Can they really fly it?
If anyone can fly it, I'm sure it's friends of our captain.
''Stevonnie falls into the cockpit of the jet.''
['''Grunts'''] Whoa! It ''is'' like a car!
['''Pops up on the windshield display'''] We'll watch your back while you take out those guns. Now launch!
['''Pops up on the display'''] Captain Lars is about to give the order to launch.
Okay. Launching. ['''Moves the gear stick from "P" to "D3"''']

''The jet shoots out from the Sun Incinerator. The shot freezes on the jet, and text appears onscreen: "THE STAR SKIPPER". The Star Skipper flies toward the Destiny Destroyer which fires on the small jet.''
Get in close! They can't aim at themselves.
Roger. Target within range. Targeting!
''Stevonnie destroys one of the Destiny Destroyer's main guns.''
One down! ['''Another is destroyed'''] That's two! ['''Another is destroyed'''] Yes! ['''Last one destroyed'''] All right! Everything's almost fixed here. Come on back.
''Several missiles are fired from the Destiny Destroyer toward the Star Skipper.''
Incoming missiles straight ahead!

''Stevonnie moves the gear stick to "R". The jet's thrusters quickly flip around to the front and activate, sending the craft in reverse. As Stevonnie watches the missiles explode behind them, they realize the last missile will catch up to the Star Skipper.''
It's too late, Lars. I can't... No! ['''Screams''']
''The Star Skipper is caught in the last missile's blast radius and sustains critical damage. The smoking jet begins to fall toward a moon.''
Steven?! Connie?! Nooooo!
'''Episode ends.'''
''Episode opens on a distance shot from space, where the Star Skipper ship is falling.''
Stevonnie tries to gain control of the ship as a screen of Lars pops up in the communicator
That did it! Emerald is on the run!
Lars! We're hit! Nothing's working!
(shocked) Wha-Hold on! What is your course? I'll try to intercept-
The connection is suddenly cut off and the screen disappears.
Lars? (presses random buttons on a panel) What is wrong with you, ship?
The screens on the ship display warnings everywhere while beeping.
Oh, pretty much everything. Well, at least the display works.
The display of the ship suddenly disappears.
(shouts) Downer!!
The ship goes down into a nearby planet
I can't pull up, we're gonna crash!
Stevonnie looks up and braces for impact as the ship crashes into a tree. Debris falls down and Stevonnie rolls down in Steven's bubble
(groaning) Oh boy. (gets up and looks around) Where are we now? Uh, hello? Anyone out there? Anyone at all?
A large flower blooms from a bud, surprising them
Ah! (relaxes) Okay, we're fine. I'm fine. (continues walking) I'll find the ship's radio and Lars will pick us right up. Whoa...
Camera pans up to the sky where they see an Earth-like broken structure floating in the sky. Suddenly, they hear a humming and they turn to see the radio of the ship
{gasps) The cockpit! (runs over) Hello?! This is Star Skipper calling Sun Incinerator. It's Stevonnie! Steven and Connie? We're stranded. We need help! Come on! Don't leave me here!
The radio stops humming and powers off.
What do we do now? That was our best chance. We can't fix the radio, the ship's beyond hope, no one knows where we are. (groans in frustration) What do we do?!?
Suddenly, they hear a sound from the bushes. In time, they activate Steven's shield to catch an unknown beetle-like creature who latches onto the shield but they throw it off.
An alien!

The creature hisses and jumps towards them but Stevonnie uses Rose's Sword to cut it in half as it is in midair. The two halves of the creature fall towards the ground, and Stevonnie is surprised to see one of the halves grow legs and the creature begins walking again. The creature hisses at them again before jumping back into the bushes

Uh... glad they're okay! ...Wait. If life can thrive here, then so can I. I've just got to hold out until Lars finds me. (walks towards the other half of the creature and stabs it with the sword) Until then... we survive.

Cut to a montage of Stevonnie walking around on the planet. They cut through a forest and use a grabbling hook to pick some fruit from a tree. They also go to a river and drink some water along with another creature. Finally, they stand in a crater-like structure, as rain pours down, pulling a cloth tied to a stick onto the crater as a cover. They also cut some facial hair using the sword, to their excitement.
Cut to later, where they hold out their hand to a small bird-like alien creature.

Come on, we have to, we're out of energy bars! (hand pulls back) But it's so cute! (hand reaches forward) But we need the protein for a healthy diet. There has to be another way! We can just take the fruit! Fruit's good!

The creature rolls away under the bush and Stevonnie turns around, seeing a larger version of the creature. It roars and they scream, running down a hill. They look up and see a tower in the distance and run towards it as the creature follows them. They squeeze through the nearly closed doors and hide until the creature is unable to get in.
Phew. Have I-been here before. No, that's ridiculous. Well. Guess I'm camping here tonight.
Cut to a campfire being made in the ground and Stevonnie builds a hammock lying down
Finally. Goodnight Stevonnie. Goodnight, Stevonnie. Sweet... dreams. (closes eyes)
Stevonnie is shown moving up through a carpet and they wake up, looking around. They notice they are in the Maheswaran Residence.
W-What? I'm... home?
A rumbling is heard and they see Dr. Maheswaran rise up from the carpet, phone pressed to her ear.
You were told to be prepared cycles ago. There will be no more excuses. Get it done. And don't expect me to look kindly upon this transgression. Embark at once.
Mom? What is she talking about? (ducks out of the way as she walks by)
Yes I know there's organic life on the surface, it's an invasion.
(shouting) Hey mom! What are you talking about?
You will stick to my orders and you will destroy them!
Hm. I hate it when she ignores me.
No. No. I will not repeat myself.
Stevonnie jumps on the couch, to a coffee table, then floats up to the window's edge.
Hey mom!
Hm. That is simply unacceptable. Well, you'll have to remember, won't you?
Annoyed, Stevonnie jumps onto her coat and climbs up to her shoulder.
The dullness of this exchange tires me. Just land the dropships and do your pathetic job for once. Or I'll shatter you and your crew myself.
(moves her hand away) Hey mom, what are you doing?!
Dr. Maheswaran opens her eyes, revealing them to be yellow with diamonds as her pupils, and she looks at Stevonnie for a second.
(picks her off on her shoulder) Honey, please. Give me a moment.
She sets them down on the floor, the setting changing to a Diamond Moon Base. Stevonnie looks back and Yellow Diamond (portrayed by Dr. Maheswaran) sits on a chair, summoning a panel with her hand.
Huh? (she turns and sees the earth like structure on the planet and ships fly by.)
(squeals happily) Whoa, cool! Yelloooow! (jumps up to her chair) Hey Yellow!
Oh, you're still here.
What are you doing?
I'm commanding the dropships to colonize this planet.
I wanna command a dropship!
Well, when you have you have your ''own'' colony, you can command whatever you want.
I want a colony!
Yellow Diamond presses buttons on the panel with four diamonds.
I want one now!
A screen unlocks revealing a dropship on the panel.
What's this?
I'm contacting the leader of the fleet.
(amazed) Let me do it! (starts pressing buttons on the screen but Yellow Diamond grabs her arm)
(angry) Don't touch that!

Why ''not''? You have so many worlds and I don't even have (stomping foot) ''one''! It's not ''fair''! I want (stomping foot) one! I want my own ''army''! I want my own ''planet''! I deserve it! I'm just as important as ''you''!
(angry) Then why don't you act like it, ''Pink''?!
Stevonnie walks away, holding their arm, angry. They approach a window and their fist clenches. Pink Diamond is seen through their reflection and the hand punches the glass smashing it.
Stevonnie suddenly wakes up from the dream, falling out of the hammock on the ground.
Whoa! (breathing hard) Steven, what was that?
Diamonds. I'm having Diamond dreams again. But, why now? Why here? (they look up and sees a mural of Yellow Diamond)
No way. (they climb up an open window) This is just like the Moon Base orbiting Earth.
They climb up another open window to the top, and notice the area was similar to the dream.

Whoa...(looks at earth like structure) That must have been a colony. Wait a second. (walks over to where the smashed glass still stands) Pink Diamond was here. Oh! (runs over to the chair) And Yellow! (pulls down the panel that is covered with vines) I hope this thing still works. Hmm. (presses a white diamond button in the middle) That pattern.
Stevonnie presses the diamond buttons that appear in the similar pattern Yellow Diamond had done. They scroll through a screen that opens.

Ooh. (swipes) Nope. (swipes) Nuh-uh. (swipes and sees a photo of Yellow Pearl and Yellow Diamond) Uhh yikes! (swipes and sees Lar's ship) (gasps) it's Lars's ship! (they click on the screen and it opens a communicator to Lars)
Keep searching! We're not giving up on them, no matter what!
Lars! Hey Lars! Hey!
(looks at screen) There you are! We've been looking all over for you!
Oh my gosh Lars, it's so good to see you!
Send cords to their signal! It's good to see you too.
Thanks, Lars.
Suddenly on the glass, they see the bird-like creature from yesterday crawl on the glass, looking down at them, growling.
Hello, bird blob. My old friend.
The creature roars and starts breaking the glass with its beak.
Lars, hurry! We've got company!
The creature turns to see the ship heading down
Yee-haw!-(looks at creature) What the heck is that?
I don't know, but it's not here to play nice.
Charge the blasters!
The ship fires blasters and the creature crawls up the glass and jumps, flying away. Stevonnie sighs in relief as the ship stops.
Hah! Looks like we just saved your butts! Let's get you up here and back home through my head.
(touches face) Yeah... I think I'm ready to go home.
The episode ends with Stevonnie getting off the chair and looking at the broken window.
''The Sun Incinerator cruises through space, its thrusters flickering. Lars is sitting in the captain's chair and the Off Colors are at their stations.''
Captain's log. Star date, uh... Thursday. Space is really big. Everything is messed up. Our nova thrusters are busted. And getting home is taking forever.
['''Turns around to Lars'''] Hey, Captain? Should we be writing this down?
Uh, yeah!

Who wants a party sub?!

You guys beat Emerald. And you rescued me and Connie from the Jungle Moon. And you have this super fast ship, so you'll be back on Earth in no time.
It's only super fast when it works! ['''Snatches the sandwich from Steven''']
['''Emerges from the engine room'''] Captain Lars... I've finished... rerouting...
Power from the gravity engine to the nova thrusters? Great! Twins, floor it on the thrusters!
Right away, Captain. Yes, Captain. ['''Activate nova thrusters''']
''The ship picks up speed for a moment before the thrusters falter and the ship's power goes out.''
Aww!
Captain Lars, don't use the thrusters. We're going to lose power!
['''Dejectedly'''] Thanks, Padparadscha.

Maybe a few pickles bigger.
Bigger than you?
I mean, they don't have to be.
Fine. Bring 'em over.
''Steven jumps into Lars' hair. After a moment, Steven reemerges with Garnet shapeshifted into Steven.''
Twins! ['''Poses with Garnet''']

There's more of you?!

Her eyes. A fusion?
He's going to bring back another Steven!
This is Garnet. She leads the Crystal Gems back on Earth.

Just look at you all! ['''Walks up to and hugs Rhodonite'''] You must be Rhodonite -- a Ruby and a Pearl? That must have been a story. ['''Puts her arm around Rhodonite and lowers her glasses slightly'''] I want all the details.
['''Chuckles nervously'''] Eh.
And you must be the Rutile Twins. ['''Gasps'''] ['''Puts her arms around the Rutile Twins'''] I've never seen anyone like you before.
We were... made like this.
['''Walks up to Fluorite'''] Fluorite. Whoa. You're just, uh, beautiful.
['''Blushes''']
['''Kneels in front of Padparadscha'''] And here's Padparadscha, an orange Sapphire. How rare.
I predict you're going to make everyone uncomfortable.
''Garnet looks at the other Off Colors, who are all staring at the floor uneasily.''
It's not nice to make fun of us like that.
Haven't you guys heard a compliment before?
A what? What's that?
You know, it's when someone says something nice about you.
Who would say nice things about Gems like us? We're completely inappropriate, and so are you. We should all be ashamed.
['''Puts her hand on Steven's shoulder'''] Aw, Steven. These Gems feel just like I did before I met Rose Quartz.
Rose Quartz?
Rose... Quartz?
You met Rose Quartz? And you survived?
You guys know about Rose?
She was the Anti-Gem -- an organic beast that burst out of Earth's crust and vowed to destroy all Gems!
No, no. She was made from a vein of hyper-defective Quartz. A malformed Quartz gone haywire.
Don't... be... silly. Rose... Quartz... isn't... real.
You have it all wrong.
Rose Quartz?!
Of course that's how they tell it on Homeworld. Come on, everyone. Let me tell you the story of the real Rose Quartz.
''A flashback begins. Silhouettes of the four Diamonds and a few of the planets they colonized are shown. A yellow, blue, or white diamond symbol appears on each planet and moon.
It was Era 1. The Diamonds, unique in their flawlessness, sought to expand their perfection across the galaxy. And it was for this purpose that Pink Diamond chose her first colony, the planet Earth.
''Pink Diamond places her hand on Earth; a pink diamond appears on Earth and its moon, with cracks emanating from the symbol on the planet.

On Earth, every Gem was made to serve Pink Diamond, each with a role to play in her world's perfect empire. In comparison to their creator, their existence was ordinary. They were life-forms only meant to fit their mold, and no one had ever dared to think otherwise -- until there was Rose Quartz.
''A cross section of the Earth's surface is shown. Gems are injected into the surface one at a time, culminating in Rose Quartz's appearance.''

In stature, she was no different than any other Quartz, and for a time, she did her best to carry out her Diamond's bidding. However, she began to take notice of her strange colony and the life that existed there.
''Rose is shown carrying rocks with other Quartzes. At some point, she trips and takes in the landscape around her.''
Curiosity turned to appreciation.
''Rose allows a caterpillar to crawl onto her finger.''
Appreciation turned to fondness.
''Rose is shown with some birds on her arms and hair.''
And fondness... turned to love.
''Rose dances with some humans and shares a kiss with one.''

Soon she was unable to keep her findings secret, and she began asking her fellow Gems if they knew of the life on Earth and what they made of it. She continued to pry her fellow kindergartners with questions so odd that word of her eventually made its way to Pink Diamond.
''Rose Quartz speaks to other Gems about Earth. Later, a Gem approaches Pink Diamond and informs her of Rose's words.''
Rose Quartz was summoned at once.
''Garnet narrates the conversation between the two.''
Quartz,
began Pink Diamond,
What have you been saying down there?
My Diamond,
Rose pleaded,
It has come to my attention that your colony, Earth, bears life. While I know these organic life-forms serve no purpose, I ask that we leave this planet and spare their lives.
Pink Diamond thought for a moment and then laughed, a wicked, empty sound.
['''Laughing'''] You wish to save these life-forms at the expense of our own? Ha! Don't be absurd. Return to your post, and I will forget your insolence.
And with that, Rose Quartz was dragged back to her kindergarten for duty.
''Rose is dragged away and continues working alongside the other Quartzes.''
Only Rose could no longer stand to continue aiding in the destruction of Earth. She had no choice. She had to fight.
''Rose stops working and jumps into the air, changing her uniform into a dress before she destroys an injector. She stands on the broken injector and speaks to the other Quartzes.''
Is this what you want -- to inject, to build? I've seen the life that exists for itself, and it lives here. Will you destroy it, or will you join it?
Rose's message began to resonate, to Pink Diamond's dismay. Her colony was falling apart. So, like a coward, she called for her Diamond allies, Yellow and Blue, to help.
''Pink Diamond is shown on her throne frowning down upon her Gems. Pink cries out and Yellow and Blue Diamond appear above her.''

But Rose also found herself with allies, other Gems that were cast out for being wrong -- a Pearl who belonged to no one... a Bismuth who built weapons for rebels instead of towers for tyrants... an entirely new fusion for not power but for love... and countless others, all inspired by Rose to live for ourselves on Earth.
''Pearl, Bismuth, and Garnet are shown in turn. The three Gems are then shown standing beside Rose along with numerous other Gems.''
She was our leader. And Earth was our precious home. And those who fought to save it became known as... the Crystal Gems!
''The Crystal Gems raise Rose's Battle Flag and their weapons.''
Unbelievable.
There were Gems like us?
Fighting.
For... their... freedom?

Yes, and we were fearless. It was an impossible fight, but we fought anyway. And the more Gems who saw us, the more who joined. But Pink Diamond's forces proved too strong. Rose feared that soon she would have nothing left to protect. Rose Quartz drew her rebel blade... and shattered Pink Diamond, saving the Earth for all time from her reign of terror.

''The flashback resumes: Rose leads her army against Pink Diamond's. Rose observes her Crystal Gems suffering from the war, and eventually decides to confront Pink Diamond herself. The rebel leader appears before Pink in her palanquin and shatters the Diamond with her sword.''
Wow! That's incredible! I don't believe it!
['''To Steven'''] Your mom did all that? That's awesome!
Wait. What about the rest? What happened after that?
''Steven and Garnet glance at each other.''

The other Diamonds were furious. In a last-ditch attempt to wipe out the Rebellion, the Diamonds launched a direct attack against Earth, and in their fury, they used their powers to end the fighting once and for all.

''The three remaining Diamonds are shown pointing their hands at the Earth. Their hands are glowing, creating three diamonds of light visible from the planet's surface. Seeing the light, Rose quickly creates a massive shield and pulls Pearl and Garnet behind the shield. The light from the Diamonds intensifies and engulfs the Earth. The flashback ends and the Off Colors stare at the floor sadly.''
I predict this story won't have a happy ending.
We were all told different stories. But they all ended the same way.
With Rose Quartz... being... defeated.
This new version of the story is even worse! So, she was great, and they beat her? What are we supposed to get out of this -- that we can never win?!

We haven't yet, but we can, ['''Takes of glasses'''] and we will. They said they annihilated Rose's rebellion, but here we are. They said they annihilated all of you on Homeworld, but here you are. They think they have us on the run, but they're the ones that are running from the truth. And the truth is we... are... everywhere!
But how many more of us can there be?
Way more than you think! I was only on Homeworld for, like, an hour before I ran in to you guys. There must be Off Colors all over the place.

Rose used to say there was something about Earth -- something that set Gems free. But it's not just Earth. Look at you. Love, freedom -- it's universal. You all prove it every moment you live as yourselves. You can show everyone.
We... can do that?
Not while we're floating out here like sitting ducks. Fluorite, let's take another look at that engine. ['''Stands up and points''']
Yes! Okay! Yeah!
Lars.
''Everyone heads down to the engine room. Lars and the Rutile Twins each work a panel in front of the engine while the other Off Colors stand beside them. Garnet and Steven sit on the steps nearby.''
Before we can activate the thrusters, we're going to need to restart the core.
How do we do that?
We'll figure it out together.
Hey, uh, Garnet? When Connie and I were stranded on the Jungle Moon, I -- we -- saw something... a vision... of... Pink Diamond.
Hmm.
When Blue Diamond came to Earth, I had dreams where I saw through her eyes and I was crying her tears. If I'm having the same dreams about Pink Diamond, what if that means she's still out there?
She's gone, Steven. ['''Puts her hand on Steven's back'''] Your mother made sure of that.
But I felt such a strong connection. ['''Leans on Garnet's leg''']
['''Puts her hand on Steven's head'''] You have empathetic powers that other Gems don't have. You're unusual, Steven, like them and like me. It's not something to fear. It's something to celebrate.
['''Smiles''']
Come on, come on.
Oh, strange. The core should have come online by now.
I predict that Captain Lars will be pressing the wrong button.
Oh. ['''Takes hands off panel''']
''The ship's power is restored.''
Yes! We did it!
''Everyone returns to the upper level and Rhodonite, the Rutile Twins, and Padparadscha return to their stations.''
Does that mean you can get back to Earth?

We can hit up the nearest colony for parts. Rhodonite, tell me there's one nearby.
Well, we aren't far from one of Yellow Diamond's asteroid mines. But that place will be crawling with Agates, Captain. It's incredibly dangerous.
So are we. ['''Holds his cape in front, posing, before pointing forward'''] Let's show 'em!

Maybe a lullaby will help. (''starts playing the guitar'')
(''worried'') Uh, I'm not sure this is gonna...
(''snores, then sees the Cluster about to pop out of its bubble'') (''gasps'') The Cluster! Stay calm. Try to keep from forming.
(''pops out of its bubble'')
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, noooo! (''wakes up'') It popped!

''Steven and the others go outside to find the Cluster forming a giant hand the size of Blue and Yellow's ships. It tries to get used to its movements by clenching and moving it fingers. The others are shocked. In the city, alarms are played in the speakers''
Attention, citizens of Beach City. Everyone, head to your designated shelters. I repeat, this is not a drill! Get yourselves over to the shelters.

''Ronaldo takes out his katana and aims it at the Cluster, but Peedee pulls him away. The hand gains momentum then punches Yellow Diamond's ship, sending it flying away. It goes to Steven and others and gave a thumbs up''
Alright, looks like it's in control of itself, and it's on our side. (''thumbs up'')
''Yellow Diamond's ship tries to land a punch but failed. They then proceed to arm wrestle''
Go Cluster, go!
''They then notice Blue Diamond's ship which flew over the temple. It then faces them, and slaps the ground. It slowly rises back up until Blue Diamond is shown off the ship''
Blue Diamond!
I guess it's time to work the old Universe charm.
No!
Alright, I'll just be in here. (''goes inside the house'')
Rose Quartz. So you escaped Homeworld and crawled back here. This is (''raises her veil, crying'')Pink's world! How dare you use it as your hiding place! Come! Answer for what you've done!
This is bad! This is bad! This is bad! This is bad!!!
Come on, you rocks! Let's put her in a bubble!
Right!
Wait, there's no reason to fight. Let me talk to her. Blue Diamond, please listen to me. I didn't shatter Pink Diamond. Pink Diamond's right here. It's pretty interesting when you think about it.
(''fires an energy ball'') Enough!
''Steven, after being shot at, was caught by Alexandrite''
(''roars'')
Wait!
You cannot fathom how much I've mourned. What thousands of years of grief has done to me.
''Blue Diamond uses her pathokinesis that made Alexandrite defuse and everyone except Connie fell to their knees and cried''
What's going on? Guys?
''Connie whistles, summoning Lion, to which she jumps on to''
Hold on, guys!
Connie!

''Connie unsheathes her sword from its scabbard. Lion then leaps towards Blue Diamond, then Connie jumps towards Blue Diamond, hoping to attack her. But then her sword was caught by Blue Diamond, while Connie struggles to get it back''
I know this sword. This is the sword that shattered her!
''Blue Diamond shatters the sword, which made Connie fall down. She was eventually caught by Lion.''
You deserve this. All of you.
Stop. Please!
Steven!
What do we do?
I don't know. She won't listen. She just wants to fight.
Blue Diamond!
Who are you supposed to be?!
I am the will of two Gems to care for each other. Protect each other from any threat. No matter how vast or how cruel. You couldn't stop me 5,750 years ago and you can't stop me now.
It's you! That Ruby and Sapphire that disrupted my court.
Ugghhh!(''clings and punches Blue Diamond's cloak'') This is supposed to be my day!
You hoped to defeat me by clinging to my feet?!
I just needed to keep you from taking three steps to the right.
''Water droplets drop on Blue Diamond's head. Both Blue Diamond and Steven look at the sky, finding Lapis at the sky together with the barn. Lapis then drops the barn onto Blue Diamond''
What?!
''Blue Diamond got hit by the barn, which ceases her pathokinesis''
(''exhales in relief'')
Lapis?! (''runs towards Lapis'') You're really here.
Hey.
Lapis! (''hugs Lapis'') You came back! Again!
I couldn't stay away. If they're gonna punish me like a Crystal Gem, I might as well be one. Right? You got room for one more?
Of course!
Save the hugs for after the fight! Look alive!
''Blue Diamond gets up from the barn, much more enraged''
(her voice breaking) Lapis Lazuli? Does every Gem that comes in contact with this planet turn traitor?!
''She attacks once more using her pathokinesis, which made everyone to fall to their knees and cry, including Connie, except for Lapis and Lion''
(''shocked'') What?
I've felt worse.
''Lapis uses her hydrokinesis powers to chain Blue Diamond's hands, effectively ceasing once again her pathokinesis''
Knock her off this beach!
Now's our chance
''The Crystal Gems summon their weapons, preparing to attack the already chained Blue Diamond, struggling to move''
With all our strength together, we can take her down.
That's right! This is our home, our planet, our friends and family! We... are the Crystal Gems!
Pathetic! You are nothing!

''Blue Diamond summons 7 energy balls which combine into one energy ball that fires massive barrages onto the Crystal Gems. Steven summons a shield to shield them from the barrages, which are so strong that he slowly goes backwards. The other Crystal Gems help Steven to keep hold of his shield. When the barrages are gone, Connie and Lion first attack, with Lion using his concussive roar, with Amethyst then using her whip on Blue Diamond. Blue Diamond is going to attack, but is caught by Lapis and chains her. Pearl fires a laser on her face, then Lion warps on her head, and Garnet and Bismuth hit Blue Diamond's right arm at the same time. Peridot fires 8 tin cans on her back and taunts''
Hey Blue Diamond, fight me!
You got guts, tiny. Let me (''grabs Peridot on the head'') give you a hand.
''Peridot screams as she was thrown to the Blue Diamond's face''
Everyone, group up!

''Lapis uses her hydrokinesis to put them in a water bubble, which is thrown to Blue Diamond. Yellow Diamond's ship is still seen arm wrestling with the Cluster. As they approach near, the bubble is removed but Peridot is thrown off Blue Diamond's face. The Crystal Gems then summon their weapons, which knocks Blue Diamond down. Yellow Diamond's ship is seen getting destroyed, and is used by the Cluster to wreck down Blue Diamond's ship, crushing her, and sending debris of Blue Diamond's ship flying. One big debris hits the house''
The house!
Don't worry, I can fix it.
My dad!
Uh oh.
(''carrying Cat Steven'') Alright, I'm sticking with you guys.
''They Garnet, Lapis, and Steven regroup with the others''
Did we do it?
(''approaches Steven, deforming'')
Cluster, you were amazing! Are you okay? Do you wanna go back in your bubble?
(''thumbs up, unfused, then retreats back to Earth's core'')
Okay, take it easy. You're the best!
So that is a wedding reception. Nice job, wedding planner.
Did you see that?! She couldn't lay a finger on me!
Hmm... But did you notice how I perfectly managed my trajectory right into her eyes. I'll demonstrate. (''jumps on Bismuth's arms'') Launch me again!
I like you, Peridot. You don't quit.

''A heavy metal thumping was heard on Yellow Diamond's ship. Yellow Diamond manages to get out of her destroyed ship, now fierce and angry. She goes down and help Blue Diamond who was stuck from under her own ship. Everyone is shocked, except for Peridot''
Heh, I told her off once (''jumps off Bismuth's arms''). I can do it again. Hey! Yellow Clod! Remember me?!
No. (''zaps Peridot'')
''Peridot becomes destabilized then retreats back to her gemstone''
Stop! Don't do this! Listen to me! I'm the one you're missing! I'm Pink Diamond!
(''shocked'') You!
''Yellow Diamond rushes to Steven and while she runs, Steven summons his shield''
Steven!
''Yellow Diamond steps on Steven, which causes him to black out. He then wakes up to an abstract psychic plane''
Huh!
Steven!
Connie, what's wrong?
Come on, please wake up! (''looks to the right'')
I'm up, I'm up. What's going on? Connie I'm right here.
Come on, Steven. We need you.
''Steven sees his own body next to him and freaks out''
What the hoo-hah?! Huh, (''waves his hand on his body'') well this is new. What is this place?
''Steven is seen on top of Connie's head, which represents her mind. Garnet's, Amethyst's, Pearl's, Bismuth's, and Lapis' are also seen''
What else have you got?! I've only just begun to fight!
(''gasps'') Lapis!

''Lapis is then poofed by Yellow Diamond's electrokinesis. Yellow Diamond's and Blue Diamond's minds are also seen, with their respective auras, Yellow's being yellow electricity and Blue's being blue and water-like''
Connie, are you seeing this?
Wake up, please! (We're supposed to be in this together, remember?
Uh, Connie, I'm o-kay?
Huh? Steven?
(''holds Connie's hand'')
Huh?
Connie, it's me!
Wha-where are you? How are you...?
I'm not sure, but I think it's a classic psychic ghost type situation.
Ah, of course! So, what's the plan?
The Diamonds won't listen to me out there, but maybe I can get through to them here. They gotta know Pink Diamond wasn't shattered. Please protect my body while I'm gone.
Got it. Good luck out there, Steven.
''Steven then goes to Garnet''
(This is it. I've got to hold it together. I've got to hold everyone together!)
You can do it, Garnet! Remember: You're made of love!
Steven? (Huh, always full of surprises.) (''punches faster'')
''Steven makes his way to Amethyst''
(Don't get shattered, don't get shattered, don't get shattered!)
Amethyst, I believe in you!
(Steven? I can do this, I can do this, I can do this!) (''whips faster'')
''Steven lands on Pearl''
(''shoots lasers'') (I won't give up. Everything I do, I do it for her! I do it for him!)
Don't forget about yourself, Pearl!
(I do it for me!) (''uses the trident to slice'')
''Steven jumps to Bismuth''
(I just got my friends back, and now, I'm gonna lose 'em again?!)
We can do this, together!
What am I thinking? We haven't lost yet!
''Steven jumps and lands to Peridot's poofed gemstone''
Hang in there, Peridot. You too, Lapis
''Steven then sees the Diamonds then flew towards them. Yellow and Blue is seen sitting''
(How miserable. I knew Pink couldn't handle her own colony. But, I gave in. And now, I'm to blame for her fate.)
(''knocked by her aura'') Ah, her thoughts are too strong! (''floats over to Blue'')
(What good will any of this do? The more I make these Gems suffer, the more I long to see you again, Pink.)
(''knocked by her aura, but insists to go, and swam in her aura to her head'') Almost! (''touched her head'') Blue Diamond, please listen! (''knocked again'')
I felt something. Someone.

It worked. I gotta get through to them. (''swam in her aura again to her head, struggling'') Pink isn't gone! I can explain everything if you just stopped this fighting! Wooaahh! (''knocked once more'')
There it is again.
What are you jabbering about?
A presence! It feels like...
Please, Blue. You're being hysterical. More so than usual.
(''swims to Yellow's aura'') Listen, Yellow. Pink's fate is different than you think. She faked her shattering! (''knocked back again'')
This feeling. I know it!
It must be a trick! Show yourself, foe!
I'm not your foe. Please just listen to me.
There!
''Both Diamonds blasts surges of energy onto Steven, only to find Steven emitting a pink aura, which shocks them and stops them from attacking. His gem is seen glowing''
(Please, the fighting has to stop. We aren't enemies. We're family. Please listen to me. I need you to know who I am!)
Impossible!
This aura...

''Both their hands come out to catch Steven as he floats down, with Blue's hand superior while Yellow's hand is inferior. Steven's gem glows and he suddenly wakes up. He then gasps as he sees Yellow and Blue Diamond looking at him in shock''
(''in tears'') It's you... Pink!
(''hugging Steven while crying tears of joy'') Ah... Oh, Pink! I can't believe it! You've been here all along!
(''crying'') I can't just hand Steven over to Blue Diamond! She's a shatterer!
(''crying'') She's not gonna hurt him. Look at her.
''Blue Diamond laughs happily and continues to hug Steven''.
She really thinks he's one of them.
(''crying, desperate'') Ahh!! Can somebody make Blue Diamond stop?!
Are you guys okay?
(''crying'') It's just… ''(sniff)'' ugh, Blue Diamond's power. She's obviously relieved that Pink Diamond wasn't shattered after all.
''Yellow Diamond tries to activate her ship but it's destroyed.''

(''approaches the house'') Hm… How could you do this to us, Pink? Why did you let us think you were shattered? Why the strange disguise? Why are you doing a voice? Why didn't you say something at the trial? And Blue, can you please stop crying? I can't see.
…Sorry!
''Blue Diamond stops crying and releases Steven at the entrance of the house, next to Pearl and the rest of the Crystal Gems.''
My mom kept the secret from everyone.
(''clears throat'')
''Almost'' everyone.
What are you talking about?

Well, apparently Mom… Oh, geez, you don't know what a mom is… Okay! Pink Diamond took the form of Rose Quartz permanently after faking her shattering. Then Rose Quartz gave up that form to create a new life with my dad: me. Rose passed her gemstone and some of her powers onto me, but that's all. I… I don't have any of Pink or Rose's memories… I'm sorry…
''Yellow Diamond stares at Steven's gem.''
Hmm… I'm sure your memories are in there somewhere, Pink.
Actually, I go by Steven.
Oh, stars! How did you even survive?! We blasted the planet and obliterated every Gem on its surface!
They weren't exactly...  obliterated…
The Crystal Gems and the Diamonds teleport at the location where the Centipeetles are located.
''Steven opens the door and shows the Centipeetle Mother to the Diamonds.''
What am I looking at?
(''noises'')
No one should've survived our attack.
Centipeetle's mind is broken. I've tried to heal her but it didn't stick.
Heal her?
But maybe you two can help her! You're so much stronger than me, and… I got close!
Well, that's not something we normally do…
This is completely unprecedented.
But ''you'' did this to her! You have to help her— all of them!
Hmm, very well… I can try, but I won’t make any promises.
''Yellow Diamond uncorrupts Centipeetle — she's a Nephrite.''
There, good as new.
(''noises'')
She may be too far gone.
Gently, Yellow.
''Blue Diamond's hand glows and further heals Nephrite's mind.''
There we are!
(''starts crying'') No! Please no! No! No! We’re all gonna be-!
''Nephrite keeps repeating "No! Please no! No! No! We’re all gonna be-!"''
Centi?
''Steven licks his right palm and heals Nephrite even further.''
No, please-!
Centi! It's okay! It's okay!
''Nephrite opens her eye and looks up at the diamonds.''
Nephrite! Facet-413 Cabochon-12!
''Everyone is in shock.''
W-what?!
Unbelievable.

I’m sorry for my failure to heed my Hessonite's evacuation orders… My team and I tried our best to make it out before the attack, but… You're here and it must've worked! You finally avenged Pink Diamond! You destroyed Rose Quartz!
''Blue and Yellow Diamond let go of their fingers. Nephrite corrupts back into Centipeetle. Steven comforts Centipeetle.''
Uh, Pink. How many perfectly adequate Gems did you have us ruin?
Shh, Yellow! Pink's been punished enough. She’s been trapped here in this awful planet with these… creatures.
Do it again! It was working!
How long do you expect us to hold her together?
I don’t know. Forever! You did this! So you have to do something!
We can only do so much, if it was the four of us.
Oh no! We can’t let her see this!
Who? Who do we need?
What do you mean "who"? ''White.''
''Everybody looks shocked.''
W-White D-Diamond?
What?!
''Pearl walks to Steven.''
Steven. White Diamond isn't like us. She isn’t even like them. ''(gestures to Yellow and Blue Diamond)''
You have no idea what she's capable of!
I just want to talk.
I don't think you'd have much luck with that… White… hasn't left Homeworld in eons.
Then we're going to Homeworld!
In what?! You and your "friends" destroyed both our ships!
Unless… You don't still have yours do you?
''The Crystal Gems and the Diamonds head to The Desert''
This place is filled with Mom's junk, so there's a good chance it's buried around here! We can split up the area like a grid and divide the search! It's just past these pink pyramids!
''The Diamonds look like they already know it's Pink Diamond's ship.''
We've got a lot of deserts to cover. It may take a while and be really super hot! But if we don't give up I know we can find it!
''Pink Diamond's ship activates.''
Uh… Steven.
(''gasps'')
''Pink Diamond's legs-shaped ship stands up.''
Oh… (''chuckles'')
''Pink Diamond's ship hovers in the sky and creates a shadow over Beach City which many Beach City citizens notice a leg ship. Ronaldo then records the leg ship.''
''Dr. and Mr. Maheswaran help Connie to get ready for the mission.''
You're going to do great! You sure you have everything? Food, water? Where's your sword?! I can't believe I'm saying that.
That's okay, Mom! This is going to be a diplomatic mission!
And I'll be with her the whole time! I know the planet! There's an atmosphere. She'll be able to breathe.
''The Maheswarans look up at the leg ship as it glimmers.''
Alright, be careful! Come home safe.
Oh, thanks, Mom! Thanks, Dad!
(''holding Steven's Hot Dog Duffel Bag'') I can't believe I'm finally going to Homeworld! There might be more Famethysts!
Love you, Shtoo-ball! Be careful out there.
I love you too! I'll be back before you know it! Lion! Bring it in, buddy!
Garnet, should I be worried?
Steven… will be fine… (''holding Cat Steven)'' If you could water this while I'm gone, this would be a big help.
Oh, uh-, Sure thing!
(''to Lion, hugging him'') Don't miss me too much! (''giggles'')
''Steven notices Bismuth and starts walking to her.''
Bismuth? Are you ready?
I-
''Bismuth and Steven look at the broken hand ships.''
I'm not gonna join a Diamond entourage! I know what you're doing, I get why you gotta do it, but I'm not gonna lay my gem on their anvil…
"Anvil"…?

Okay! ''(places her hand on his shoulder)'' Let me put this in Earth terms for you. You're about to enter the "lions' den". Luckily, you're a "lion" too! You better roar at them in their language; you're the one that has to do it.
Right.
Besides, you're gonna need me at the home base. Someone's gotta keep an eye on these two while you're gone.
''Bismuth is holding Peridot and Lapis Lazuli's gemstones.''
We'll be waiting for you when you get back.
Hmm? Ok!
(''to the Crystal Gems'') Let's go to Homeworld!
Yeah!
(''sarcastically'') Fantastic.
''The Diamonds and the Crystal Gems go inside the leg ship.''
''Steven steps on a footplate to control the legs of the ship. A pink aura forms around Steven's legs.''
It's a good look for you, Steven!
Thank you!
Oh, it's been so long since we've been together in Pink's ship. (''eyes welling up with tears'')
''Steven and Yellow Diamond's eyes start to tear up.''
Please, Blue. If we could continue…?
Yes, of course… (''wipes away tears'')
(''to Steven'') For launching, just get a running start.
''Steven struggles to maneuver the legs of the ship.''
You got this, Steven!
Hold on! I'm taking off!
''The ship jumps up into the air, then into space.''
(''to Pearl'') I bet when Mom took off, it was pretty graceful, huh?
Heh… no, not really…
Should I have brought a gift for White Diamond? We ''are'' dropping in unexpectedly, and… I want to make a good first impression. Her help will mean everything for the Corrupted Gems.
Steven…
Hmph. "Good impression"? We'll be lucky if she ever ''speaks'' to us again after this…
But—
The thing is, White… can be… ''difficult''…

When we show up in this ship, it will become irrefutable that the last 6,000 years are now the biggest galactic embarrassment that's ever happened. And ''we're'' the ones to blame. (''to Steven'') If you don't want to be in a bubble for the next few millennia, I suggest you let ''me'' do the talking.
''Awkward pause.''
Ahem… we're here…
''Connie and Amethyst wake up from sleeping after leaning on Garnet. Garnet stands up.''
(''yawns'') Really?
(''falls over'') Ugh, what …gives?
''The Gems look out at Homeworld — the planet is somewhat fragmented into large pieces.''
Homeworld…
''Pink Diamond's ship lands on Homeworld, onto some sort of arena.''
Everyone, wait here. Blue and I will return for you, …once ''White's temper has cooled.''
…Which might take a while…
But—
Wait, that sound…

''Pink Diamond's ship is situated across from White Diamond's body-shaped ship. The arena is filled with various Gems cheering in unison, in a formation of the original Great Diamond Authority logo.''
…Woah! Maybe things won't be so bad…!

''A white bubble descends from above. Inside the bubble is a white Pearl, with a navel gemstone and a series of scarlike cracks from the top of her right eye and through her left eye to the bottom of her left cheek.''
It's White's Pearl…
Pink Diamond, your presence is required.
Come on, Blue.
Only ''Pink'' Diamond's presence is necessary. (''glides forward toward Steven'')
Uhh, maybe we could…
''White Pearl, unmovingly, encases herself and Steven in a white bubble.''
(''gasps'')
''The bubble flies away.''
Wait!…
…Steven!
''The bubble enters and phases through the walls of White Diamond's ship. The bubble is removed and White Pearl phases into the wall behind her. Steven is left in front of White Diamond.''
Pink! There you are!
''Steven looks up in awe.''
Hello, starlight, you certainly gave everyone a scare. They're all just thrilled to see you safe and sound.
Um, hi… I—
As for this latest little game of yours… thank the stars it's over! Did you have fun? (Eyes narrow slightly) Did you get everything out of your system?
I—
(dismissively) Good, good… Everyone is so relieved. Welcome home, Pink.
''White Diamond encases Steven in a bubble.''
…Wait, hold on!
''The bubble is sent to a room with pink curtains. Steven looks through the curtains to see White Diamond's ominous-looking ship.''
